abilities.description: (PASSIVE)FURY OF THE XER'SAIRek'sai generates Fury by Attack and hitting with basic abilities. She consumes this Fury while Burrowed to restore health.
abilities.name: FURY OF THE XER

abilities.description: (Q)QUEEN'S WRATH / PREY SEEKERRek'Sai's next 3 basic attacks deal bonus Physical Damage to nearby enemies. While Burrowed, Rek'Sai launches a burst of void-charged earth that deals Physical Damage and reveals enemies hit.
abilities.name: QUEEN

abilities.description: (W)BURROW / UN-BURROWRek'Sai burrows into the ground, gaining new abilities and increased Move Speed. Her vision range is reduced and she cannot use basic attacks. While Burrowed, Rek'Sai may cast Un-burrow to knock up and damage nearby enemies.
abilities.name: BURROW / UN

abilities.description: (E)FURIOUS BITE / TUNNELRek'Sai bites her target, dealing double and True Damage if she has max Fury. While Burrowed, Rek'Sai creates a re-usable, long lasting tunnel. Enemies can destroy it by standing on top of either entrance.
abilities.name: FURIOUS BITE / TUNNELR

abilities.description: (R)VOID RUSHRek'sai passively marks targets by damaging them. She can activate this ability to become briefly untargetable and lunge at a marked target for heavy damage based on their missing health.
abilities.name: VOID RUSHR
